thread.title: Fashion boutique owner Suzanne Leong says many of Macau's restaurants and retails are suffering as locals and tourists alike tighten purse strings
thread.title_full: Fashion boutique owner Suzanne Leong says many of Macau's restaurants and retails are suffering as locals and tourists alike tighten purse strings

author: Eduardo Leal
title: Fashion boutique owner Suzanne Leong says many of Macau's restaurants and retails are suffering as locals and tourists alike tighten purse strings
text:
Fashion boutique owner Suzanne Leong says many of Macau's restaurants and retails are suffering as locals and tourists alike tighten purse strings Eduardo Leal Dec 17, 2024 Dec 17, 2024 Updated 8 mins ago 0 Facebook WhatsApp SMS Print Copy article link Save Fashion boutique owner Suzanne Leong says many of Macau's restaurants and retails are suffering as locals and tourists alike tighten purse strings Eduardo Leal Tags Partners/afp As featured on +5 Chinese casino hub Macau struggles to evolve beyond gaming In the shadow of the Grand Lisboa, the Macau casino world-famous for its "golden lotus" design, fashion boutique owner Suzanne Leong wonders if the economic miracle that initially made her fortune has now cast her aside.
